on input: an optional alignment field; on output: the offsets of the alignment field in the formatted text.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Lang.Object ParseObject (string string, Java.Text.ParsePosition position);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Lang.Object ParseObject(string string, class Java.Text.ParsePosition position) cil managed

Docs.param: input/output parameter, specifies the start index in string from where to start parsing. If parsing is successful, it is updated with the index following the parsed text; on error, the index is unchanged and the error index is set to the index where the error occurred.
Docs.summary: Parses the specified string starting at the index specified by position.
